scripts.init: npm install && npm run boot -- --scope=@hashtube/dev && npm run build-dev && npm run boot && npm run build
scripts.clean-full: npm run clean && node ./scripts/dev run clean-all && lerna clean --yes
scripts.format: node ./scripts/dev run lint && npm run lint-cy
scripts.format-full: node ./scripts/dev run prettier && npm run prettier-cy && npm run format
